title: The Dust of Everyday Life
description: Rerelease from Campus Cravings - The Dust of Everyday LifeCole White loves watching the Cathia University swim team. Seeing them in their sexy swimsuits always makes him hot. Seever Hilmarson is the best looking guy on the swim team and Cole is shocked that the guy only has eyes for him.Seever can’t get enough of Cole. The man is the hottest musician he’s ever met. Touching Cole is the best thing Seever has ever experienced. He knows he’ll never get enough of the man. When they come together, it’s like fireworks, and Seever is going to make sure Cole knows how much he cares.
author: Sara York
